unnormalised: Arre yaar, Virar local sodanch ukra zata! Schedule-an 6:15 AM sharp vorta mhunta, punn ti sadarannponnan 6:30 AM vo even 6:45 AM porian yetai. Ani Thane thaun Dadar-ak peak hours-antlean lagpi traffic-achi gozal tor soddumuch di, sopeponnan 2 voram lagtat! Bangalore-ak flight 22/12-ak asa, 8 PM-ak bhair sortoli, umed kortam, hea pavtim kitem addkal na zai.
normalised: Arre yaar, Virarchi local sodanch ukheer zata! Schedule-ant saun vajeer pondhra minuteamni soddta mhonn asa, punn ti sadharanponni saun tees minuteamni vo saun challees ani ponch minuteamni yeta. Ani Thane thaun Dadar-ak peak hours-antlea traffic-acher ulo korunkuch naka, sahajikponni don voram lagtat! Bangalore-ak flight baiis December-ak asa, raatchea aat vajeer soddta, kiteak tor hea pavtim ukheer zaunchenam.
text: Arre yaar, Virar local sodanch ukra zata! Schedule-an 6:15 AM sharp vorta mhunta, punn ti sadarannponnan 6:30 AM vo even 6:45 AM porian yetai. Ani Thane thaun Dadar-ak peak hours-antlean lagpi traffic-achi gozal tor soddumuch di, sopeponnan 2 voram lagtat! Bangalore-ak flight 22/12-ak asa, 8 PM-ak bhair sortoli, umed kortam, hea pavtim kitem addkal na zai.
